meanings.definition: The act or process of creating decorative designs with pins.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed doing pinwork on her craft projects.
meanings.sent2: The pinwork on the pillow added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The pinwork on the dress made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a canvas, and the pinwork was her paintbrush.
meanings.sent5: The intricate pinwork on the tablecloth caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A decorative design created with pins.
meanings.sent1: The pinwork on the corkboard displayed her favorite photos.
meanings.sent2: The pinwork on the quilt showcased her creativity.
meanings.sent3: The pinwork on the hat made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The pinwork on the map marked all the places they had visited.
meanings.sent5: The pinwork on the banner welcomed guests to the party.
